1.20.4.1.20.4-4.4.6: Fixes an issue that would cause large zipped resource packs to load slowly.

1.20.2.1.20.2-4.4.6: Fixes an issue that would cause large zipped resource packs to load slowly.
1.20.2.1.20.2-4.4.5: Refactors pack namespace retrieval to fix stack overflow with mods that scan all resources.
1.20.2.1.20.2-4.4.4: Round fractional frame times down to be consistent with vanilla.
1.20.2.1.20.2-4.4.3: Fixes emissive overlays not synchronizing with base texture animations for OptiFine `.properties` resource packs.
1.20.2.1.20.2-4.4.2: Fixes MoreMcmeta's internal list of default plugin names not matching the actual default plugins.
1.20.2.1.20.2-4.4.1: Fixes an issue where MoreMcmeta would not recognize legacy sprite names in 1.19.4+.
1.20.2.1.20.2-4.4.0: Adds API support for GUI metadata to prepare for an update to 1.20.2. Expands texture atlas support to atlases not on a predefined list. Fixes an issue where sprites in non-block atlases would not animate in 1.19.4 and 1.20.1.

1.20.1.1.20.1-4.4.6: Fixes an issue that would cause large zipped resource packs to load slowly.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.4.5: Refactors pack namespace retrieval to fix stack overflow with mods that scan all resources.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.4.4: Round fractional frame times down to be consistent with vanilla.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.4.3: Fixes emissive overlays not synchronizing with base texture animations for OptiFine `.properties` resource packs.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.4.2: Fixes MoreMcmeta's internal list of default plugin names not matching the actual default plugins.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.4.1: Fixes an issue where MoreMcmeta would not recognize legacy sprite names in 1.19.4+.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.4.0: Adds API support for GUI metadata to prepare for an update to 1.20.2. Expands texture atlas support to atlases not on a predefined list. Fixes an issue where sprites in non-block atlases would not animate in 1.19.4 and 1.20.1.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.3.0: Fix crash when resources reload, but the applied resource packs haven't changed.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.2.5: Improves general performance by not updating animated textures that are not being used. Improves performance with large animation frames by processing them on multiple threads. Fixes an issue where the default frame time setting would be ignored for .properties animations.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.2.4: Fixes an issue where Minecraft's hardcoded blur settings for the enchantment effect would override metadata settings.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.2.3: Adds an icon for MoreMcmeta's internal resource pack. Includes a change that may improve compatibility with mods that scan all resources.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.2.2: Fixes an issue with root resource retrieval that causes a crash on Quilt.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.2.1: Includes several fixes for edge cases when resource packs are added by other mods.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.2.0: Adds support for animated resource pack icons. Plugins can now load metadata for root resources (like `pack.png`) in packs that aren't currently applied.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.1.0: Adds a feature that allows plugins to silence certain `InvalidMetadataException`s in logs. Suppresses log messages about unimplemented OptiFine features that can cause log spam.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.0.1: Fix exception when other mods request invalid ResourceLocations.
1.20.1.1.20.1-4.0.0: Added support for OptiFine animations. Added texture configuration API.

1.17.1.1.17.1-3.0.1:
Fixed incompatibility with Continuity on Fabric.
Fixed an issue that prevented non-block sprites from being animated.
Unused mipmaps are now freed, reducing memory usage by approximately 25% for most textures.
Updated file licenses to 2022.
1.17.1.1.17.1-3.0.0: This version is the same as 1.16.5-3.0.0, except that it works on 1.17.1.

1.16.5.1.16.5-3.0.1:
Backport of version 1.17.1-3.0.1.
Fixed an issue that prevented non-block sprites from being animated.
Unused mipmaps are now freed, reducing memory usage by approximately 25% for most textures.
Updated file licenses to 2022.
1.16.5.1.16.5-3.0.0: This update adds support for atlas textures (blocks, items, paintings, etc.) as well as a new daytimeSync parameter.

1.16.4.1.16.4-2.1.0:
This update adds support for animating main menu textures (except the Mojang logo, which is hard-coded to use the vanilla image).
This version is labeled 1.16.4 because I used a 1.16.4 version for development. However, I have tested that the mod loads on the recommended 1.16.5 version of Forge.
Internally, constructor and method object parameters are now treated more strictly. Unit tests have been expanded to check that errors are thrown early in case of nulls. This should provide for easier debugging in the event of any bugs related to null values.
1.16.4.1.16.4-2.0.1: Prevent no-longer-animated textures from being cleared on third reload and after
1.16.4.1.16.4-2.0.0:
Use .moremcmeta format to avoid invalid name errors
Clean up old textures on reload
